titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Meyer writes to the "Times" in response to me, as well as other Nonconformists. The net result is not very encouraging.
Harry Reichel came to see me, & stayed some while. Also Mr Jameson lunched again, & bestowed another quarter of an hour on sketching my hopeless face!
